item.title: 10 Signs You've Spent Too Long in Academia (A Satirist's Guide)
item.description: You know you’ve spent too long in academia when the phrase “let’s table this discussion” fills you with both rage and resignation. Here are ten signs that the ivory tower has become less of a workplace and more of a lifestyle. 1. You Have Opinions About Fonts Not just “Comic Sans is unprofessional” opinions. We’re talking “I can’t take this email seriously because they used Calibri instead of Times New Roman, and everyone knows Calibri is for people who’ve given up” opinions.
